props.name: defaultOpen
props.description:
The open state of the tooltip when it is initially rendered.
Use when you do not need to control its open state.

props.name: delayDuration
props.description:
Override the duration given to the `Provider` to customise
the open delay for a specific tooltip.

props.name: disableClosingTrigger
props.description: When `true`, clicking on trigger will not close the content.

props.name: disableHoverableContent
props.description:
Prevents Tooltip.Content from remaining open when hovering.
Disabling this has accessibility consequences. Inherits
from Tooltip.Provider.

props.name: ignoreNonKeyboardFocus
props.description:
Prevent the tooltip from opening if the focus did not come from
the keyboard by matching against the `:focus-visible` selector.
This is useful if you want to avoid opening it when switching
browser tabs or closing a dialog.

props.name: open
props.description: The controlled open state of the tooltip.

events.name: update:open
events.description: Event handler called when the open state of the tooltip changes.
